attributes.action: wear a blue fright-wig, white greasepaint, a red nose, yellow braces and oversized shoes to all public functions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In addition, the entire cabinet must wear clown outfits at all times, and all ride to Westminster in the same Morris minor.  A custard pie fight is obligatory following Prime Minister's Questions.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
